user_instruction: 'Send an email to HealthTech Innovations (info@healthtechinnovations.com) with the necessary details for the software development. You can check out my Gmail and Notion for information.'

formatted_items.content: I’d be glad to draft the email, but I don’t have direct access to your Gmail or Notion workspace. Could you please paste or summarize the key information (project scope, timelines, deliverables, data-handling requirements, points of contact, etc.) that you’d like included? Once I have those details, I’ll prepare a polished message to send to info@healthtechinnovations.com.

final_output: I’d be glad to draft the email, but I don’t have direct access to your Gmail or Notion workspace. Could you please paste or summarize the key information (project scope, timelines, deliverables, data-handling requirements, points of contact, etc.) that you’d like included? Once I have those details, I’ll prepare a polished message to send to info@healthtechinnovations.com.
